title: Manchester United transfer news and rumours: David de Gea latest
description: All the latest Man Utd transfer news and rumours from across the British and European press on Friday, January 19.
content: Manchester United are ready to rival Man City's attempt to sign Jean Michael Seri from Nice, according to The Guardian.United, Liverpool and Chelsea are all looking at the Ivory Coast central midfielder, with Manchester City also poised to join the chase, according to various reports.United will open negotiations with Marcos Rojo over a new contract, according to the Daily Mail.David de Gea has refused to be drawn on speculation that he could soon sign a new Manchester United deal, but has expressed his happiness at a "very special" club.The 27-year-old is out of contract at the end of next season and it has been reported that talks are set to begin over a new long-term deal at Old Trafford.
